metadata.title: CVE-2021-23225 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Cacti 1.1.38 allows authenticated users with User Management permissions to inject arbitrary web script or HTML in the "new_username" field during creation of a new user via "Copy" method at user_admin.php.

criterions.comment: cacti package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
